title: The Ace Family Drama Continues…
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Manny and Laura talk about their Thanksgivings, they go over the Ace family contradictory video, how Rihanna might be pregnant, how Kim and Pete's relationship might be a PR stunt, how Britney Spears popped off on Christina Aguilera, and much more!
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733

More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.

Thanks to our sponsors: 

Get 20% Off and Free Shipping at Manscaped.com with code FOOL. Be the ballsiest gift-giver this year with MANSCAPED.

Follow “Harsh Reality: The Story of Miriam Rivera” on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or you can listen early and ad free by joining Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondery App.

Explore Away's full range of all things travel and start your 100-day trial today by going to awaytravel.com/fool.

We want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at betterhelp.com/foolcoverage.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
